elements.name: number_structures_total
elements.title: How many structures are in this homestead?

elements.name: number_of_structures_sprayed
elements.title: How many structures were sprayed in this homestead?

validators.text: The number of structures sprayed must be equal to, or less than, the total number of structures

elements.name: any_structures_unsprayed
elements.title: Were there any structures left unsprayed in this homestead?

elements.name: n_rooms_locked
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed because it was locked?

elements.name: n_rooms_nobody
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed because nobody was home?

elements.name: n_rooms_refused
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed because occupants refused spraying?

elements.name: n_rooms_baby
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed because the house has new born baby?

elements.name: n_rooms_patient
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed because the house has a patient?

elements.name: n_rooms_funeral
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed due to a funeral ?

elements.name: n_rooms_kitchen
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed because they are kitchens?

elements.name: n_rooms_food
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed because they food storage areas?

elements.name: n_rooms_material
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed due to non-sprayable material (ie canvas)?

elements.name: n_rooms_other
elements.title: How many structures were not sprayed due to the "other" refusal reason provided before?
